front.title: IPv6 Deployment in Internet Exchange Points (IXPs)

abstract.t: This document provides a guide for IPv6 deployment in Internet Exchange Points (IXP). It includes information regarding the switch fabric configuration, the addressing plan and general organizational tasks to be performed. IXPs are mainly a layer 2 infrastructure and in many case the best recommendations state that the IPv6 data, control and management plane should not be handled differently than in IPv4.
